sense.def:
Z izrazom
naturally
povemo, da je nekaj samoumevno in ne presenetljivo.

seg.quote: Dena was crying, so naturally Hannah was upset.
‘Do you propose to take account of that?’—‘Naturally.’

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj razvije iz nečesa drugega
naturally
, se razvije kot logična posledica tistega.

seg.quote: This leads us fairly naturally into what career advisers call careers counselling.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi ali obstaja
naturally
, se zgodi ali obstaja v naravi in tega ne povzroči človek.

seg.quote: They tried to reproduce artificially what they had observed to happen naturally.

sense.def:
Kadar se človek vede
naturally
, ne poskuša ničesar prikriti in se ne pretvarja.

seg.quote: The children were too frightened to behave naturally.

sense.def:
Besedo
naturally
uporabljamo tudi, ko opisujemo lastnosti, s katerimi so se ljudje rodili in jih niso pridobili pozneje.

seg.quote: She had a naturally cheerful and serene expression.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
comes naturally to someone
, nekdo tisto opravlja z lahkoto.

cit.quote: imeti v krvi, biti pisan na kožo
